同じ立場なんだよ
google_translated:
With other subjects
It's the same position

en_text: However, I don't want to turn you into a living doll.
jp_text:
僕も君を ただの人形に
してしまうのは望まない
google_translated:
I also to just a doll
I do not want to

en_text: I pray you'll be more obedient the next time we meet,
jp_text: 次に会う時は もう少し—
google_translated: When I meet next time, a little more-

en_text: Farewell for now.
jp_text: 今 行く　指示を待て
google_translated: Wait for an instruction to go now

en_text: Save me, Kirito-kun.
jp_text: 助けて… キリトくん

en_text: Next Episode
jp_text:
（キリト）
次回「世界樹へ」
